name: Lycan vs Vampire Run - Running Game
name_original: Lycan vs Vampire Run - Running Game
description:
Test your reflexes as you race down ancient vampire city and along sheer cliffs. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, collect coins and power ups, and see how far you can run! Angry Vampire Run is a fun running game. There are a lot of challenge and the nice 3D environment. Let goo...to play this game you will have an run trips. Some time you can surf in the ground, jump and acrobatic and more action. Dodge the trucks and some obstacles you will get success.
